translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の連中と同じように寝ていた方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You would have died more easily if you had just been sleeping like the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽に死ねたってのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could have died peacefully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、なんだなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, what is it? What is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「眠り損なった奴がいたのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was there someone who missed their sleep?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可哀想になぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How pitiful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あ……お、お前ら、どこから……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, ah... y-you guys, where did you come from...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぞろぞろと、次から次へと魔物兵が姿を見せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One after another, monster soldiers appeared in a stream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はははっ！　どこからって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha! Where else but from the entrance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入り口からに決まってるだろう！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, from the entrance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆、眠っているから簡単に入れたぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since everyone was asleep, it was easy to get in!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、起きている悪い子は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, the naughty children who are awake...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永久に眠りましょうねぇ〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's put you to eternal sleep~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわっ、うわぁあぁあああ〜〜〜〜！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uwah, waaaaaahhhhhh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長が剣を振り下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain swung down his sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supreme Command Headquarters—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「報告です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reporting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスにおいて、正体不明の力により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Leesas, due to an unidentified power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にやすやすと占領される報告が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there have been repeated reports of the demon army easily occupying areas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相次いでおります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have come in succession.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ〜？　なんだ、そりゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? What the heck is that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「残念ながら、原因は未だ不明。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunately, the cause remains unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目下、調査中です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are currently investigating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザス内にある各地の砦や野営地が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Various forts and camps within Leesas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼ戦闘が行われることなく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are being occupied almost without any fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 占領されている、とだけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's all the information we have.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「兵士は何してた？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What were the soldiers doing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうやら……眠っていたようです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently... they were sleeping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだとー！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-What!?,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなすっとこどっこい共は死刑だ死刑！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such fools deserve death, death!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統、落ち着いて下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supreme Commander, please calm down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら何かの力による、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, it seems to be due to some kind of power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集団睡眠にあったものと思われます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that caused a group sleep state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「集団睡眠、ということは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Group sleep, so that means...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スリープの魔法か何か、でしょうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it some kind of sleep magic or something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい、私達参謀はその線を疑っています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-Yes, we staff officers suspect that line of reasoning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何か……魔人の特殊な魔法か力か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some... special magic or power of the demon lord...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく、兵には注意するようにと伝えてますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, we have told the soldiers to be wary,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 原因が分からなければ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but if we don't know the cause,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対策の取りようもなくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no way to take countermeasures...
Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「集団睡眠……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Group sleep...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、な……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, could it be...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス平原――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leesas Plain—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Herman—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線にある砦の、見張り台に上った兵が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A soldier who climbed up the watchtower of the frontline fort

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 月に向かって大口を開けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: opened his mouth wide toward the moon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふわああああ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fuwaaaaah...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ、眠い……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, so sleepy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 滲んだ涙をぬぐうため目を擦りながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rubbing his eyes to wipe away the blurred tears,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと隣を見れば同じく見張りの兵が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he glanced beside him to see another guard

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウトウトと船をこいでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nodding off and dozing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、こいつ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, this guy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、ここのところ彼が砦を守る為に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, recently, he had been working recklessly to protect the fort.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 随分無茶な働き方をしたことを知っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was known that he had been taking quite unreasonable actions.

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 他の連中と同じように寝ていた方が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You would have died more easily if you had just been sleeping like the others.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 楽に死ねたってのに」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: You could have died peacefully.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「お、なんだなんだ？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Oh, what is it? What is it?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「眠り損なった奴がいたのか？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Was there someone who missed their sleep?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 可哀想になぁ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: How pitiful.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、あ……お、お前ら、どこから……！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, ah... y-you guys, where did you come from...!?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ぞろぞろと、次から次へと魔物兵が姿を見せる。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: One after another, monster soldiers appeared in a stream.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はははっ！　どこからって、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Hahaha! Where else but from the entrance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 入り口からに決まってるだろう！
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Of course, from the entrance!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆、眠っているから簡単に入れたぜ！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Since everyone was asleep, it was easy to get in!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「さあ、起きている悪い子は……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Now then, the naughty children who are awake...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 永久に眠りましょうねぇ〜」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Let's put you to eternal sleep~

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「うわっ、うわぁあぁあああ〜〜〜〜！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Uwah, waaaaaahhhhhh!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔物隊長が剣を振り下ろした。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: The monster captain swung down his sword.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rance Castle—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 総統司令部――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supreme Command Headquarters—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「報告です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Reporting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザスにおいて、正体不明の力により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: In Leesas, due to an unidentified power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 魔軍にやすやすと占領される報告が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there have been repeated reports of the demon army easily occupying areas.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 相次いでおります」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: They have come in succession.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「はぁ〜？　なんだ、そりゃ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Huh? What the heck is that?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「残念ながら、原因は未だ不明。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Unfortunately, the cause remains unknown.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 目下、調査中です」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: We are currently investigating.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「リーザス内にある各地の砦や野営地が、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Various forts and camps within Leesas,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ほぼ戦闘が行われることなく
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: are being occupied almost without any fighting.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 占領されている、とだけ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: That's all the information we have.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「兵士は何してた？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: What were the soldiers doing?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「どうやら……眠っていたようです」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently... they were sleeping.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「な、なんだとー！？
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: W-What!?,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: そんなすっとこどっこい共は死刑だ死刑！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Such fools deserve death, death!

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「総統、落ち着いて下さい。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Supreme Commander, please calm down.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: どうやら何かの力による、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Apparently, it seems to be due to some kind of power,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 集団睡眠にあったものと思われます」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: that caused a group sleep state.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「集団睡眠、ということは……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Group sleep, so that means...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: スリープの魔法か何か、でしょうか？」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it some kind of sleep magic or something?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「は、はい、私達参謀はその線を疑っています」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Y-Yes, we staff officers suspect that line of reasoning.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「何か……魔人の特殊な魔法か力か……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Some... special magic or power of the demon lord...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「とにかく、兵には注意するようにと伝えてますが、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Anyway, we have told the soldiers to be wary,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 原因が分からなければ、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: but if we don't know the cause,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 対策の取りようもなくて……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: there's no way to take countermeasures...
Hmm...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「集団睡眠……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Group sleep...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: まさか、な……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: No way, could it be...?

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: リーザス平原――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Leesas Plain—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ヘルマン――
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Herman—

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 前線にある砦の、見張り台に上った兵が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A soldier who climbed up the watchtower of the frontline fort

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 月に向かって大口を開けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: opened his mouth wide toward the moon.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ふわああああ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Fuwaaaaah...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: くっ、眠い……」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ugh, so sleepy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 滲んだ涙をぬぐうため目を擦りながら、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Rubbing his eyes to wipe away the blurred tears,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ふと隣を見れば同じく見張りの兵が
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: he glanced beside him to see another guard

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ウトウトと船をこいでいた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: nodding off and dozing.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「あ、こいつ……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Ah, this guy...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: しかし、ここのところ彼が砦を守る為に、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: However, recently, he had been working recklessly to protect the fort.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 随分無茶な働き方をしたことを知っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: It was known that he had been taking quite unreasonable actions.
